message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its value and the unique features it offers, I am extending an offer to purchase it from me at a special price. Considering the significant worth of the product to you, I propose a transaction price of $13500. This offer allows you to acquire the product at a competitive rate while ensuring you receive a valuable asset. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.
